heading: Unlock Your Digital Potential
description: I craft high-performance, scalable, and visually stunning web applications...
call_to_action: Let's build something exceptional together. Contact me today.

sidebar.name: Shlomi Nugarker
sidebar.description: Passionate about building innovative, high-performance web applications tailored to business needs. With expertise in Node.js, React, Next.js, and PostgreSQL, I create powerful, scalable solutions that drive success.

contact.title: Let's Build Something Amazing
contact.description: I specialize in crafting high-performance, scalable applications that drive business success. Whether you need a custom web solution, want to optimize an existing project, or seek collaboration on cutting-edge technology—I'm here to help. Let's connect!

projects.title: Some of my works.
projects.description: Explore a selection of projects I've worked on—ranging from freelance work and company collaborations to in-depth case studies showcasing my problem-solving and technical expertise.
